notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: SS coordinated data collection, carried out the analyses, drafted the initial manuscript, and approved the final manuscript as submitted, conceptualized and designed the study. KR statistic analysis and participate to biochemical essays. DG participates to biochemical and molecular assays. OL participates to biochemical and molecular assays. HS developed the propagation model and calculated the exposure values, reviewed and revised the manuscript, and approved the final manuscript as submitted. LM conceptualized and designed the study, obtained funding, reviewed and revised the manuscript and approved the final manuscript as submitted.
